name: minimalSYMBOL
description: A more minimal and less assertive approach to the new deviantART user symbols.
additional_info:
This style has been created based on the feedback I've read in the site update.
It's possible an official update reflecting this feedback will be released. I would suggest that you keep an eye on the site updates, and remove this userstyle if any such update is made.

- Fixed the colour issue in the favourites drop-down. Thanks kingofthedededes73!
- Fixed the colour issue in journals! +2
- Got rid of the outgoing image.
- Put the symbols back at the top of the username, instead of right next to it; after they got moved.
